title: New: ALA.NI – Suddenly Remix ft. Chester Watson
content:
Following on from the release of ALAN.

NI’s stunning You & I Summer EP, featured track ‘Suddenly’ undergoes a dark, brooding transformation as Chester Watson crafts his own lyrical sphere. Beginning as a smooth, velvety entity, ‘Suddenly’ in it’s original carnation is a seemingly straightforward, yet beautiful piece of music. However within the depths of the track there is a darker core, and in his remix Chester Watson has unearthed this essence and laid it bare in his own interpretation.

Accompanied by an equally menacing video, you can listen to/watch the remix below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
